data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Uttarkashi, Uttarakhand, India to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Uttarkashi, Uttarakhand, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Uttarkashi, Uttarakhand, India.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Uttarkashi to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the county of Uttarkashi to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Rajput Rajbansi (Muslim traditions) people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Uttarkashi, Uttarakhand, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the county of Uttarkashi. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the county of Uttarkashi.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

location.name: Uttarkashi
location.people_groups_list: Dagi (Sikh traditions), Bandhamati (Hindu traditions), Jaunsari, Lunia (Muslim traditions), Rajput Garhwali Jimdar
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Dagi (Sikh traditions) (200), Bandhamati (Hindu traditions) (100), Jaunsari (93,000), Lunia (Muslim traditions) (400), Rajput Garhwali Jimdar (108,000)
